channel.title: A Cinematic Accident?
channel.description:
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M0zyH6QM7zM[/url]
Not sure whether this scene is scripted into the game to be as perfect as I captured it as, or whether I just got really lucky. In any case, kick ass.

item.title: A Cinematic Accident?
item.dc:creator: TheBunnyKicker
item.description:
This is exactly what happened when i played through this part. I don’t see any “accidents”

Read full topic

item.title: A Cinematic Accident?
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Yeah, it’s probably not intended/expected to be this perfect, but if you go fast enough it happens and it’s amazing.

Read full topic

item.title: A Cinematic Accident?
item.dc:creator: nerog
item.description:
mr.Hazard:

what are you talking about? i cant see anything wrong here… everything you did was a part of the game

You’ve misunderstood what I’m saying, I’ve spoken to a few friends about this and it turns out the music isn’t cued to the events like I thought it was. In other words when you push the button, the music is not related to the action you are seeing, so it could be the end of the song, which in my opinion wouldn’t be as cinematic compared to the place in the song where I pushed the button.

Read full topic
